title: Young and Beautiful
moodBlurb: Gilded longing wrapped in strings. The fear of love fading with youth, set against 1920s grandeur.

title: Motion Sickness
moodBlurb: Sharp observations delivered softly. The push and pull of complicated relationships, anger hidden in a whisper.

title: Cherry Wine
moodBlurb: Achingly gentle acoustic confessions. Love that knows it's dangerous but can't let go.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: Falsetto cries in a wooden cabin. Love stripped down to its most fragile, desperate form.

title: Cosmic Love
moodBlurb: Stars colliding in the dark. Love as a force of nature, overwhelming and all-consuming.

title: Clair de Lune
moodBlurb: Moonlight spilling across piano keys. The quiet ache of memory and beauty intertwined.

title: Space Song
moodBlurb: Drifting through cosmos of feeling. The weightless sadness of letting go and floating away.

title: Video Games
moodBlurb: Lazy summer afternoons drenched in nostalgia. Devotion wrapped in vintage Americana haze.

title: Breathe Me
moodBlurb: A whispered plea for connection. The courage it takes to admit you're breaking.

title: Rhiannon
moodBlurb: A witch taken by the wind. Mystery and power woven through classic rock velvet.

title: Apocalypse
moodBlurb: Love whispered in the dark. The end of the world shrunk down to two people.

title: No Surprises
moodBlurb: Lullaby for the quietly desperate. Beautiful melody hiding existential exhaustion.

title: Wicked Game
moodBlurb: Desire that burns like slow fire. The sweet torture of loving what you can't have.

title: Nights
moodBlurb: The shift from day to night, from one life to another. Memory and ambition colliding at the switch.

title: Mad World
moodBlurb: The world seen through glass, cold and strange. Childhood wonder curdled into adult numbness.

title: exile
moodBlurb: Two perspectives on the same heartbreak. The pain of realizing you never understood each other at all.

title: Creep
moodBlurb: Worship from the shadows. The ache of feeling utterly out of place in a beautiful world.

title: Running Up That Hill
moodBlurb: A desperate bargain with God. The wish to trade places, to truly understand another soul.

title: Everybody's Changing
moodBlurb: The panic of watching everyone grow while you stand still. Change as both threat and promise.

title: Landslide
moodBlurb: Standing at the crossroads of time. The gentle terror of looking back and forward at once.

title: Supermassive Black Hole
moodBlurb: Gravitational pull made sonic. Seduction and destruction orbiting each other endlessly.

title: Unwritten
moodBlurb: The blank page of possibility. Every moment a chance to rewrite who you are.

title: Teardrop
moodBlurb: A heartbeat made visible. The delicate violence of love and loss suspended in air.

title: Bitter Sweet Symphony
moodBlurb: Strings that build like life itself. The walk through a world you can't quite control.

title: How to Save a Life
moodBlurb: The moment you realize you couldn't reach them. Regret and helplessness crystallized in piano.

title: Unchained Melody
moodBlurb: Longing that transcends time. A voice reaching across impossible distance for the one it loves.

title: Karma Police
moodBlurb: The quiet menace of surveillance. Justice as a weapon wielded by the weary.

title: Saturn
moodBlurb: The impossible scale of the universe made personal. Wonder and gratitude for existing at all.

title: Born to Die
moodBlurb: Love with an expiration date printed on it. The glamour of choosing destruction together.

title: Dreams
moodBlurb: Wisdom wrapped in velvet harmonies. The calm acceptance of heartbreak's inevitability.

title: Black Hole Sun
moodBlurb: A prayer for oblivion. The beauty of destruction washing everything clean.

title: The Sound of Silence
moodBlurb: Darkness as a conversation partner. The profound loneliness of modern disconnection.

title: Hallelujah
moodBlurb: A broken hallelujah that still means something. Love and loss and faith all tangled together.

title: Summertime Sadness
moodBlurb: Sun-drenched melancholy. The way summer endings feel like little deaths.

title: Somebody That I Used to Know
moodBlurb: The strange erasure of intimacy. How someone can become a stranger after being everything.

title: In the Air Tonight
moodBlurb: Tension building like a storm. The anticipation of something inevitable and dark.

title: Fast Car
moodBlurb: The dream of driving away from everything. Hope and disappointment racing side by side.

title: All Too Well (10 Minute Version)
moodBlurb: Memory as a wound that won't heal. Every detail of a relationship preserved in amber and pain.

title: Heroes
moodBlurb: One day of defiant love against the world. The choice to be extraordinary even when it's impossible.

title: Feeling Good
moodBlurb: The dawn after the longest night. Reclaiming yourself with power and grace.

title: Everybody Wants to Rule the World
moodBlurb: Synth-pop wisdom about power and desire. The seductive danger of ambition.

title: Cry Me a River
moodBlurb: Revenge served ice cold in a velvet voice. The satisfaction of surviving someone's regret.

title: Hounds of Love
moodBlurb: Love as pursuit and terror. The terrifying vulnerability of surrender.

title: A Case of You
moodBlurb: Love like drinking wine until you can't stand. The willingness to be completely consumed.

title: Kiss from a Rose
moodBlurb: Love as addiction and light. The strange way darkness makes beauty more precious.

title: Iris
moodBlurb: The wish to be truly seen by one person. Love that would give up everything for a moment of understanding.

title: Nutshell
moodBlurb: The weight of trying to change and failing. Stripped-down honesty about struggling to hold on.

title: Purple Rain
moodBlurb: Guitar solo as spiritual transcendence. Love and regret washed clean in purple light.

title: Fake Plastic Trees
moodBlurb: The exhaustion of living in an artificial world. Beauty found in weariness and plastic dreams.

title: Perfect
moodBlurb: Simple, uncomplicated love. Finding your person and knowing they're the one.

title: Africa
moodBlurb: Yearning for somewhere you've never been. The romance of rain and distant places.

title: Blue
moodBlurb: The color of sadness made into sound. Raw vulnerability with nowhere to hide.

title: Time After Time
moodBlurb: A promise that echoes through years. Being the constant in someone's changing life.

title: Little Lies
moodBlurb: The comfort of beautiful untruths. Dancing through heartbreak with a smile.

title: Put Your Records On
moodBlurb: Sunlight through kitchen windows. The quiet encouragement to be exactly who you are.

title: Fix You
moodBlurb: The promise to be there when everything falls apart. Love as patient rebuilding.

title: Chasing Pavements
moodBlurb: The circular maze of unrequited love. Running toward something that might lead nowhere.

title: Lovesong
moodBlurb: Simple devotion in swirling guitars. Love stripped to its most essential promise.

title: Viva la Vida
moodBlurb: The rise and fall of kingdoms inside one person. Glory remembered from the ground.

title: Ocean Eyes
moodBlurb: Falling into someone's gaze and losing yourself there. First love as tidal pull.

title: Angels
moodBlurb: The feeling of being watched over. Love that protects even when the world doesn't.

title: Strange Fruit
moodBlurb: Horror made beautiful and unbearable. The weight of witness carried in a voice.

title: Moonlight Sonata
moodBlurb: Moonlight turned into notes. The weight of solitary thoughts in the quiet hours.

title: Somebody to Love
moodBlurb: A cathedral of voices asking one question. The desperate need to be loved completely.

title: Jealous
moodBlurb: Missing someone who's moved on. The impossible jealousy of watching them love again.

title: November Rain
moodBlurb: Rain on a wedding that can't last. The orchestral ache of love that wasn't enough.

title: Take On Me
moodBlurb: The exhilarating chase of new love. Synthesizers bright enough to jump into another world.

title: Between the Bars
moodBlurb: Escape offered in a whisper. The dangerous comfort of numbing the pain together.

title: Glory Box
moodBlurb: Desire wrapped in scratched vinyl and longing. The plea for more than just this.

title: Lover, You Should've Come Over
moodBlurb: Regret that could fill oceans. The empty space where love should have been.

title: Everlong
moodBlurb: Love at full volume. The wish for this moment to never end, wrapped in distortion.

title: Hide and Seek
moodBlurb: Vocoder voices fracturing emotion. The surreal clarity of a world falling apart.

title: Losing My Religion
moodBlurb: Unrequited love as existential crisis. The mandolin of madness and missed connections.

title: To Build a Home
moodBlurb: Home as memory and loss. The piano chords of building something beautiful that couldn't last.

title: Such Great Heights
moodBlurb: Electronic optimism about fate. The mathematical certainty that you belong together.

title: Don't Look Back in Anger
moodBlurb: A crowd with arms raised. The choice to let the past be the past, together.

title: Someone Like You
moodBlurb: The dignity of letting go. Wishing someone well when it destroys you to do so.

title: Piano Man
moodBlurb: A bar full of stories at closing time. The shared loneliness of broken dreams.

title: Under Pressure
moodBlurb: The bass line of anxiety. Two legends asking if love can survive the weight.

title: Riptide
moodBlurb: Ukulele sunshine with undertow. Being swept up in someone against your better judgment.

title: The Blower's Daughter
moodBlurb: A voice cracking with restraint. Love measured in the inability to look away.

title: Take Me to Church
moodBlurb: Love as the only religion that matters. Devotion and desire tangled in cathedral shadows.

title: First Day of My Life
moodBlurb: Waking up new because of someone. The simple miracle of love making life start over.

title: Blackbird
moodBlurb: Fingers on acoustic strings at dawn. The permission to finally rise and fly.

title: Wish You Were Here
moodBlurb: The distance between two people who used to be close. Missing what's right in front of you.

title: Heartbeats
moodBlurb: Nylon strings and held breath. The universe contracted to two bodies together.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: Youth carrying ancient grief. Love too fragile to survive, sung with devastating purity.

title: Do I Wanna Know?
moodBlurb: The bass line of 3 AM obsession. Crawling back to someone you should forget.

title: Fade into You
moodBlurb: Slow drift into another person. The wish to dissolve completely into someone else.

title: Linger
moodBlurb: Feelings that won't fade when they should. The ache of wanting someone who's moved on.

title: Nothing Compares 2 U
moodBlurb: A tear rolling down a shaved head. Loss so complete it rewrites your whole world.

title: Clocks
moodBlurb: Piano arpeggios like time running out. The urgency of making things right before it's too late.

title: Stay
moodBlurb: The plea stripped to its bones. Wanting someone to stay despite every reason to leave.

title: Strawberry Swing
moodBlurb: Perfect summer afternoon caught in amber. The wish to stay in one moment forever.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
moodBlurb: Every emotion crammed into six minutes. The opera of guilt, defiance, and surrender.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: Cabin isolation and heartbreak. A voice cracking in the cold, begging love to stay.

title: Holocene
moodBlurb: Realizing you're not magnificent against the span of time. The peace in smallness.

title: re: stacks
moodBlurb: The end of the road and the start of healing. Everything lost, and somehow, hope remaining.

title: Midnight City
moodBlurb: Neon lights and teenage freedom. The city at night when anything seems possible.

title: Dancing On My Own
moodBlurb: Crying in the club and dancing through it. Heartbreak as a strobe-lit anthem.

title: Somebody Else
moodBlurb: The torture of imagining them with someone new. Synth-pop jealousy at 2 AM.

title: Youth
moodBlurb: The slow burn of destructive love. Youth setting fire to itself in beautiful ways.

title: Vienna
moodBlurb: A parent's gentle warning. The wisdom that life isn't a race, heard at the right moment.

title: In the Aeroplane Over the Sea
moodBlurb: Love letters to history and ghosts. The beautiful chaos of feeling too much.

title: A Sunday Kind of Love
moodBlurb: Lazy morning love that lasts. The wish for something steady and true.

title: Mad World (Donnie Darko Version)
moodBlurb: The world stripped to its coldest truth. Watching everyone pretend everything is fine.

title: Somewhere Only We Know
moodBlurb: A secret place from childhood calling you back. The ache of growing up and wanting home.

title: The Scientist
moodBlurb: The backward walk through a relationship. Wanting to go back to the start with someone.

title: Wonderwall
moodBlurb: The person who saves you from yourself. Devotion disguised as a bar-band anthem.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: A cabin in the woods and a breaking voice. Love too fragile to save.

title: champagne problems
moodBlurb: Saying no to a proposal and carrying it forever. The weight of disappointing love.

title: ivy
moodBlurb: Forbidden love climbing like vines. The thrill and guilt of wanting what you shouldn't.

title: august
moodBlurb: A summer love that was never really yours. Chasing someone who belonged to someone else.

title: cardigan
moodBlurb: First love remembered from a distance. Being made to feel old and new again.

title: The Night We Met
moodBlurb: The wish to unknow someone. Time travel as heartbreak, wanting the beginning back.

title: Vincent (Starry Starry Night)
moodBlurb: Brushstrokes of sorrow and understanding. The loneliness of seeing too much beauty.

title: River
moodBlurb: Christmas turned to grief. The wish to skate away from all the damage you've caused.

title: Here Comes the Sun
moodBlurb: The first warm day after a long winter. Relief and hope arriving like sunrise.

title: Gypsy
moodBlurb: Looking back at your wild younger self. The lightning that once lived in you, now settled.

title: Romeo and Juliet
moodBlurb: First love now just a movie in someone else's life. The street serenader forgotten.

title: Cannonball
moodBlurb: The risk of opening up. Two voices braiding together, learning trust in real time.

title: Halo
moodBlurb: Love as spiritual awakening. Walls coming down, light flooding in everywhere.

title: Stand by Me
moodBlurb: The simplest promise with the deepest meaning. Being there when everything else falls away.

title: Both Sides Now
moodBlurb: The wisdom that comes from learning you knew nothing. Life's illusions reckoned with.

title: Mad About You
moodBlurb: Obsession wrapped in velvet production. The madness that feels like the sanest thing.

title: Lover
moodBlurb: Slow dancing in the living room. The quiet certainty of choosing someone every day.

title: The Stable Song
moodBlurb: Coming home to find it different. The places that hold us together even when we leave.

title: Youth
moodBlurb: Carrying someone through their worst. Youth as devotion beyond reason.

title: Lullaby
moodBlurb: Spiderman is coming for you. Fear made hypnotic and almost comforting.

title: Strange and Beautiful
moodBlurb: Loving from a distance. The beauty of watching someone who doesn't know you exist.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: A cabin in the woods and a breaking voice. Love too fragile to save.

title: Holocene
moodBlurb: Smallness as comfort against eternity. The scale of geological time reducing everything to peace.

title: Skinny Love
moodBlurb: Heartbreak sung with impossible purity. Youth already knowing too much about loss.

title: Atlas
moodBlurb: Carrying the weight of everyone you love. The heroism in choosing to keep going.

title: Sinnerman
moodBlurb: Running from judgment with nowhere to hide. The relentless pursuit of consequence.

title: Hurt
moodBlurb: A life's worth of regret in a dying man's voice. Empire of dirt and fading memory.

title: I Will Always Love You
moodBlurb: Love that survives goodbye. The dignity of leaving while loving completely.

title: The Winner Takes It All
moodBlurb: Divorce dressed in ABBA gold. The devastation of losing love's gamble completely.

title: Blackstar
moodBlurb: Death transformed into art. A farewell from another dimension.

title: Silent All These Years
moodBlurb: A woman's voice finally breaking through. Years of silence transformed into music.

title: Roads
moodBlurb: Wandering through heartbreak in trip-hop fog. Asking questions with no answers.

title: Only Time
moodBlurb: Questions that only time can answer. Floating through uncertainty with grace.

title: Unravel
moodBlurb: A relationship as thread slowly pulling apart. The tenderness of unraveling together.

title: My Immortal
moodBlurb: A ghost that won't leave. The wound of someone gone but still everywhere.

title: Total Eclipse of the Heart
moodBlurb: Need as a force of nature. Turning around and finding everything dark.

title: Can't Help Falling in Love
moodBlurb: Love as inevitable surrender. Some things are meant to be, and this is one.
